website_summaries.verdict: Shoppers on a budget should look no further for an indoor grill that excels at basic tasks without breaking the bank.
pros: A top choice for consumers seeking a no-frills indoor grill that can quickly cook multiple servings at once
cons: Several users complain that the power cord is too short, making it impossible to move the grill away from the power outlet

customer_reviews.title: Best grill worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work to hide in the locker to cook hamburgers on when the boss wasn't looking and I will have to say for a small little grill or cooks fast. This grill is great to have definitely if your on night shift and nothings open around you....also boss did find out about the grill the smell gave it away best thing to do is just feed him too. This grill is easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: michael wood

customer_reviews.title: Love the removable plates
customer_reviews.text: I had the old George Foremans that did not have the removable grill plates, so I was very excited about that prospect. These are a basic model and don't do anything fancy, which was fine with me. The removable grill plates have made cleanup so much easier that we are using these much more now. The downside is that they are already showing wear on the grill plates with some of the surface material coming off. I kind of expected this since they were not very expensive. There are probably grills out there that won't do that so soon, but for the price and ease of cleaning I am not unhappy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. WalkerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I like EVERYTHING about this new grill - from the compact ...
customer_reviews.text: I like EVERYTHING about this new grill - from the compact size and bright red color matching my other small kitchen appliances, to easy-to-clean removable plates and most importantly, very fast and mess-free grilling. I have grilled the NY strip steak for 4 minutes only and it came out juicy, tender and just like I wanted it - medium rare!
customer_reviews.author: Lariska

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Easy to clean 2. Grills on both sides very well 3. Doesn't take much space Cons: 1. Doesnt have a on or off switch, you will have to unplug it to turn it off 2. The heat on the grills is towards the center. If you place something on the corners, it wont cook well 3. There is no way to control the heat
customer_reviews.author: fahadkaleem

customer_reviews.title: Works great, compact size, easy to clean, but not much cooking space.
customer_reviews.text: Have just used this grill twice to heat up frozen burgers and it worked great and very fast both times. Easy to clean with snap-out removable upper and lower grill plates and a separate grease-drip tray. Barely fits two frozen 1/3 pound burgers though so if you need to prepare more items at the same time you might want to buy a larger unit. Great for single people or couples, though, looking for a quality easy-to-use and clean kitchen grill.
customer_reviews.author: MillenniumMike

customer_reviews.title: Shattered, unusuable.
customer_reviews.text: The whole grill was completely shattered on arrival. I had ordered it as a gift the last week of January. I put it under the cabinet immediately until my boyfriend came back home from overseas and now opened it to find this.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Fetters

customer_reviews.title: Serious business
customer_reviews.text: I bought this guy mostly for my paninis. I don't like to do meats in here because I think they dry out too much. But love my hot sandwiches. But be careful, don't walk away for too long because this guy is serious business. It will get hot fast and if you don't pay attention will burn your bread. Sad it doesn't have adjustable heat. Cleaning the removable plates are the best thing in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Best GF grill ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite George Foreman grill I have ever bought... And I have bought many! The removable plates make it a cinch to clean. I would definitely buy this exact model again if anything ever happened to this one. There is no issue with the plates falling off like some other reviews have said, you just have to READ the directions and make sure you know how to reinstall them. That's it!
customer_reviews.author: Tatia

customer_reviews.title: Grill is dangerous and not worth it at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars I would smh George Forman has gone down hill BAD! Dangerous to own. The drip tray doesn't attach so it's easy to spill or move it, you can easily burn yourself on this piece of junk and it does NOT cook evenly. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! I am getting a refund. I'm sorry to say that I will NEVER buy George Forman again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Spanish Hick

customer_reviews.title: I'm one happy shopper :)
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like a George Foreman grill? I bought this as Christmas gifts for my guys. I love them but they are stupid when it comes to cooking. Both are impatient. What I love about the grill is that it can do anything. I can grill hamburgers, steaks, chicken breast, and pork chops within minutes. I can also use it to make paninis. However, this is a great gift to give to anyone without hurting your wallet. And it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: myshell1975

customer_reviews.title: Top plate falls off all the time.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst George Foreman grill I have ever had, and I have had several. This one has the worst removable plate design I have ever seen. The top plate falls off when your not cooking and falls off even more when you are cooking. I thought I could live with it, but tonight tried to make 2 hamburgers and the top plate fell off 3 times. Don't waste your money on this design.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M.

customer_reviews.title: No Grill Lines
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one that I had for years. This is not even close to the old one in performance. After preheating for 5 minutes according to the directions, the meat or fish cooked comes out very pale, no grill lines(as shown in the picture) and no browning. I can only get grill lines on the food after preheating for 12 minutes and pressing down the cover while cooking. The removable grills are so light that they do not press down enough. Wish I could return the product but now I have to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: Fits best in the trash can.
customer_reviews.text: The temperature is too hot and no way to adjust it. Burgers will be burned on the outside and raw inside. No way to adjust the temp. Oh, and 4 burgers? If they are the size of 50 cent pieces maybe. I threw mine away. I could have given it to someone but, I'm a nice guy.
customer_reviews.author: David Shelton

customer_reviews.title: George Forman
customer_reviews.text: I love it because I don’t have an actual outside bbq! And also hate it because it goes from done to burnt in seconds!! Also can only fit two servings at a time, not 4! Two chicken breast, two hamburgers you get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: Use a real grill
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this grill is that replacement plates are hard to find. Instead you almost have to purchase a new grill if the plates need to be replaced. It does the job but after a year a so, build up will start to form and cleaning will get harder.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B

customer_reviews.title: Great little Foreman grill
customer_reviews.text: I had an original with non-removable plates that were always either burning my hand when trying to clean them when still hot (the best time to wipe off burned on grease) or if I waited for it to cool, it could take forever to clean the "non-stick" surfaces. This little grill (not really big enough for 4 burgers or steaks unless they are very small) is perfect for me when I have a friend over. When the plates are cool, I pop them out and into the dishwasher from where they come out perfectly clean!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Cooks burgers quickly
customer_reviews.text: I eat a lot of burgers, and hated cooking them on the stove. This thing is great. Cooks twice as fast, obviously. The burgers seem a bit drier since so much fat drips into the tray, but I may still be overcooking them a bit. The two plates pop out and only take a few seconds to clean in the sink. I wanted the cheapest, easiest way to cook my burgers that was also easy to clean. I'm very happy with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: xThuglash

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second George Foreman. I had the first one for about 5 years and used it all the time. Thought it was great. This one, while easier to clean, has a problem with certain foods. It’s great for hamburgers or chicken breasts, but hot dogs or sausages tend to be difficult to cook on it. I prefer the original one.
customer_reviews.author: robert blonk

customer_reviews.title: Maybe 4 Servings finger sandwich size!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to upgrade from one of the original Foremen grills. We could only do one sandwich at a time on the old one and thought well, a four serving model will certainly be big enough - maybe even oversized a bit. Not so. Can barely fit two sandwiches in it (talking using your run of the mill oatnut bread and the like). The clean up is easier on this model, just disappointed in the description. Shame on us for not looking at the size details.
customer_reviews.author: John Van De Loop

customer_reviews.title: This doesn’t heat up so well. It’s not a grilling texture but more like a steamed one.
customer_reviews.text: I had the small single serve for years and upgraded to the larger size. The difference between the two are remarkable in the heating. The single was cast iron grills and the new one looks like aluminum grills . It just doesn’t heat up and brown like the original one (not even Close) Seems cheap but It does clean up super easy. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Mrs._T

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The grill arrived with a shattered/broken lid like other customers received. I sent it back immediately, which is a shame since I was so excited about the fact that it came in red.
customer_reviews.author: BuyItAlready

customer_reviews.title: grill Plates are not non stick
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used the grill it performed well. After that the grill plates became more and more non stick to the point that we will not use the grill anymore as it is so hard to clean the plates, This not something I would recommend due to the poor quality of the grill plates.
customer_reviews.author: John Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Used item?
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the box was taped back together poorly and it just looked like it wasn’t properly maintained. Opened it up and a hook is broken and there are cosmetic damages. You never know when you are ready to grill since the green light and red light don’t work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this product in April 2016 and it has worked great! The meals are easy to cook and cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: This review is for GRP1060P - I bought this product in April 2016 and it has worked great! The meals are easy to cook and cleaning is no problem. The only issue so far is the removable plates, the anti stick coating is coming off and I will no longer be able to use; wish they would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking results
customer_reviews.text: I love my GF grill. Cooking for one is a challenge and this grill enables me to grill quickly and effriciently. The only drawback is there is no way to control temp. but I have found that time on the grill is the key. I love the fact that both sides cook at the same time and this results in shorter cooking time with moister results.
customer_reviews.author: C. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling on the keto diet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little grill that makes being on the keto diet super easy. Just throw out some seasoning on a steak, chicken breast, pork chop, etc. and dinner is done in five minutes. Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: hahaha so funny

customer_reviews.title: D/washer safe amazing but broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first, but after about 2 weeks of use the plates stopped working. Hoping it’s a crazy mess up and not an actual issue because I would def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it means by temperature control other than it stops heating up once it reaches its preset temperature and cuts on and off to keep this temperature during use. The cooking trays are very easy to remove and very easy to clean (this is what NON-Stick is all about). After removing the trays, cleaning any excess grease left on the product is very easy with paper towels. You can cook about 4 burgers before needing to clean the grease trap.
customer_reviews.author: Jhess Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: The green light (signals the machine is ready to use) didn’t come on. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's a very simple idea done well. Plug it in and let it warm up. cooks from top and bottom, no turning. Grease drips into the trap and off the food. When finished, let the plates cool down and snap them out. Not sure if they are dishwasher safe, but we clean them by hand. We use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lubeski

customer_reviews.title: Plates won't lock back in place once they are taken off
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I take the plates off to wash them, it gets harder to put them back on. The first time I took the top plate off, the tab holding it on bent and no longer reaches the plate to lock it in place. The plate hasn't fallen off yet while using it but I figure once the other tab stops reaching, it will.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for two people but not four.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely is not a four person serving unless you have smaller cuts. I had to trim down my chicken breasts so they could cook evenly and on time. However, it cooks very well when I did. The meat is not as dry as I thought it would be and it is very easy to clean. I use it at least once a day and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: clou4ever

customer_reviews.title: Consider NOT putting plates in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: George Foreman, love him! It says you can put plates in dishwasher, but they are non-stick so I wash them by hand. Really easy to do. It is so convenient to use. It does take a bit longer to heat up, but that’s no big deal to me. Everything is great with George!
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE Our Grill!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good heavens!!!! Why didn't someone tell us about these things before? Everything is better when it's grilled! The only negative thing I have to say is that the '4' person grill is really a '2' person grill ... so on and so forth down the line. Just buy your grill with that in mind and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Carol S. Rosinski

customer_reviews.title: A Sticky Situation
customer_reviews.text: We only used it 3 times and each time the food stuck to the plates and pulled it apart when you opened it to flip the meat/fish. We are returning it. Possibly there was a problem with the plate coatings. We have a 2 serving that works great. Not sure if that one is by Black and Decker since it is quite old.
customer_reviews.author: Don H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill!
customer_reviews.text: We use our George Foreman at least twice a week with no problem. Love that can take the plates out and put in dishwasher. i was surprised at some of the negative reviews as this is our most used cooking grill-either on Foreman or outside grill.
customer_reviews.author: Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Safety Issue
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Foreman grill for about 5 months, and selected this one because of the removable plates. It makes clean up a whole lot easier. Lately, when I'm using it, the top plate will come off when I lift up the top to turn my food. The first time, I thought I didn't have it in correctly, but that wasn't the case. I always check the plates are securely in place each time I use it, however, it still comes out when I open the lid. Other than that, it's just ok. My previous grill had temperature control, which I loved, and will be looking for that model to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very easy too clean.
customer_reviews.text: For a single person like myself this is perfect, also would be good for two people. Four servings would have to be small size, but great for two servings. I had an older large Foreman grill, with plates that were NOT removable which made it a pain to clean, so I rarely used it. This unit has easy to remove and clean plates that makes it a joy to use. It's great to make Panini sandwiches, as well as throwing on sausages, hot dogs, & hamburgers. I use this a couple times per week. And it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised at this grill.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected, so easy to clean and easy to use. They might want to add some menu items and give a little more detail for others. I am thrilled to own this grill.
customer_reviews.author: demayor000

customer_reviews.title: Love the removable plates
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of my old GF grill because it was so difficult to clean. I hated cleaning it but I missed cooking steak, burgers, etc on it. This one with the removable plates is fantastic! Just pop out the plates and wash! I cooked bacon on it and it came out perfect! So happy I found this! Now I can grill again!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dayie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and EASY TO CLEAN!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a single mom and I love to cook but sometimes cooking can take a really long time. This grill is perfect for grilling meats and veggies. It saves me so much time and the clean only takes 2 min. It is also the perfect size. The only thing is that it appeared to be white in the picture but it is actually gray.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive.  Very easy to use.  Nonstick is superior.
customer_reviews.text: Hurray for the red, it goes with my house. Hurray for the green-to-red light that tells me it's time to put the meat in. Also hurray for the slant that allows me to grease it with coconut oil on a paper towel before cooking. Cleans up so well. And now I know not to use spray oil: I thought spray olive or coconut oil was okay, and ruined the finish of the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sandstrom

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with it. My second one. My old one was smaller - 2 person/serving. Can cook more or larger portions with this. Never use metal utensils, the nonstick surface scratches very easily. I just handwash & debris comes off easily. Got my friend to get use one after she saw me prepare our dinner quickly with it.
customer_reviews.author: takori

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen appliance!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, clean and makes food healthy and tasty!! Just put your food between the plates and start grilling! Love the way chicken comes out on this plus its so versatile! Used it as a panini press too!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works great and cleans up easily. Haven’t put the grill plates in the dishwasher because they are so easy to clean. I only wish we got a model with temperature control, but that’s my fault. Basically it takes much longer than package instructions for frozen items, but again that’s my fault. Even so, we use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Owlyn

customer_reviews.title: Really?
customer_reviews.text: We've had this product for a month tops and the non-stick coating is already disappearing from the tips of all of the grill rows. We've literally washed it by hand every time save once, and we don't use metal tools on it. How the hell is this stuff coming off already?!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: We love Foreman grills
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for sure if I was able to use it but it was way too small then what it looks like. Had to send it back as it did not serve the purpose for our big family and the amount of food we need to grill for one meal. I did buy another Foreman grill for outside which doubles and can be used for indoors as well. We love Foreman grills.
customer_reviews.author: Charizza Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Grill Plate Comes Imfastened
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give this grill any stars. Used three times before the clips no longer held the top grill plate It slides out causing arm burns. Dangerous. The clips are terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: Didn't heat evenly. Quality was poor and nothing like the excellent quality of the original George Foreman products.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hining

customer_reviews.title: Used every day.
customer_reviews.text: Wipe it after every use with a wet paper towel. Dont remove except every once in a while. No problems everyday use for about 5 months. Still looks new all over.
customer_reviews.author: TimmyP

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend getting the one that doesn't remove the plates until ...
customer_reviews.text: The removable plate pins bent after the first use and would not hold into the top plate. I would recommend getting the one that doesn't remove the plates until they enhance this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stamaris

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!!! I love how easy it is to clean. Just pop the grill plates out and wipe them clean. I also bought the special sponges that are specifically made to clean the grill, so that helps. (I havent put them in the dishwasher yet and probably won't). As far as grilling, it does a great job! My meat comes out perfectly every time. I only wish this one had a timer like my last one. And an on/off button couldn't hurt either!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Returning, the whole grill gets hot enough to burn youR hands. And the drip pan is so shallow it will over flow. Very disappointed and dangerous
customer_reviews.author: hunter

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed sums it up. My first GF was of ...
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed sums it up. My first GF was of much higher quality materials. Also, guess I measured wrong, this one cost 30% more and is 30% smaller. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The plates were quickly soiled, burned food, and became uncleanable. Replacement cooking plates cost more than buying a new one. Weak
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He uses it almost every day to grill a sandwich for lunch. He also grills chicken and hamburgers on it when it is too cold or rainy to use our outdoor gas grill. He says it is faster than grilling outside and he likes that it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Albretsen

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen gadget.
customer_reviews.text: I just love this grill. Had one years ago but this is SO much easier to clean. A wipe whilst warm - and your done!
customer_reviews.author: The Brit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved my George foreman’s grills. This last one I purchased is so nice!! Easy to clean. The pop out grills are fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Glyndora Graves

customer_reviews.title: Finally... removable plates.
customer_reviews.text: Finally... removable plates. The George Foreman grill has been a staple of kitchens for about 20 years, but the worst thing about them was always cleaning the plates. With this, you can just remove them, put them in the dishwasher, and put them grill when they're done washing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but wish tray was attached
customer_reviews.text: We use it primarily for burgers and it does what it's supposed to do. The removable grates are a breeze to clean. Wish the drip tray could be attached to the unit rather than just loosely sliding under the front edge. If for some reason you move the unit while it's cooking, better remember to move the tray too.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The revised version of the George Foreman (GF) Grill is a nice change. Yes its smaller than the old classic 4 piece setting, but its removable grates and hinged top lid makes up for it. It does not get as hot as the old white classic one that I had but its still hot enough to cook and grill. I love doing some chicken and fish on it. Makes cleanup real easy by throwing it into the dishwasher if need be. The old one still works, i just moved it from my home to the office.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bose

customer_reviews.title: Returning Grill
customer_reviews.text: I found the plates hard to clean. We do not run the dishwasher every day so the plates were always handwashed. They did not clean easily and it took a lot of washing before I felt the back swere grease free after cooking one hot dog. I was concerned that w/ the back of the plate next to the heating element the grill is a fire hazard. One of the plate's back has a discolored spot and the fronts do not look like they were just thoroughly washed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mini-Indoor Grill
customer_reviews.text: This George Foreman grill has all the features and functions you need for a small indoor cooking grill. It's great for multiple reasons, such as its compact size, portability, ease of cleaning, price range, quality brand name, choice of colors and grilling ability. I really don't have any negative feedback. That's why I rated it 5 out of 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Magra

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old George Foreman grill, which they have made some updates compared to the old ones. I love that the grill plates are removable which makes them super easy to clean. The grill works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made should be 10-20 bucks
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a 15-20 dollar grill, quality is very poor and seems insanely cheaply made. Also on the small side. Was looking to upgrade a very old one I had but super disappointed. Also usps is the worst, the very worst.
customer_reviews.author: markus knows

customer_reviews.title: I decided to try this 4 serving and it's great! Even the kids cook more on it now
customer_reviews.text: I have used an old two patty George Foreman grill for many, many, years and my kids joke me about the burners were peeling. So, I decided to try this 4 serving and it's great! Even the kids cook more on it now. Very happy with the product for the price. I think my son will try to take it to college in August. FYI, my first George Foreman grill has lasted for over 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, a grill without the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I expected and wanted it to do. Bargain of a price as well (I paid about $34) • Cannot adjust temperatures as you like, but if you are looking to just get something on the grill and grill it from both sides, this does exactly that • Both sides of the grill are not even in temperature so if left alone, you will see the top side burn before the bottom is even charred.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous grill. Smaller than a lot but perfect size for me. Plates remove easily for cleaning. I have had a number of George Foreman grills. All have been wonderful. I cook for one now and this size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Vincent

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I finally bought a Forman Grill. SO glad I did! I love it!! It took a few try's to get used to it, but once I did, its amazing. I use it almost every day. It is so easy to clean and looks good on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Red Wine Road

customer_reviews.title: It has it all!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a small Foreman fixed-grill for many years. I now wanted one that is larger and that has removable grill plates. This has those features. In minutes i grill meats and vegetables. There is no need for oil, so I am cooking healthier. I love that I fix a quick meal that is healthy and tasty. Clean-up is so easy with the removable plates. I use this grill most days and I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product!! Smelled like burn wire and the pieces didnt stay on its place!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Dialed This One In Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Finally! The grates are paper light instead of the heavy bulky older ones. Easy to use, heats up super fast, cooks evenly and clean up is a breeze. Smaller and more powerful. I am so very satisfied with this one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great for burgers.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly but a little small. It says it is for four hamburgers but really only fits two normal sized patties. You would need the eight size to fit four patties. I still love the unit and will buy a larger one. It is very easy to clean compared to the original 1 piece units and it makes perfect well done hamburgers every time in 8 minutes cook time.
customer_reviews.author: Daren Price

customer_reviews.title: Meals in 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Had to discard my old one but needed to upgrade. LOVE this 20 minute meal maker!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 serving
customer_reviews.text: This grill is NOT 4 serving, it's 2. And the clips that hold the grill plates don't hold the plates very securely. Quality is not as good as it once was.
customer_reviews.author: Davixster

customer_reviews.title: Does not even fit two full size sandwiches while my other grill easily did. The hinge at the back is useless
customer_reviews.text: Base is too small. Does not even fit two full size sandwiches while my other grill easily did. The hinge at the back is useless. It does not go as high as it should be to press upper and lower sandwich loaf equally. As a result, 50% of sandwich gets grilled more than other half. Returned it next day.
customer_reviews.author: amazon reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for family of 4
customer_reviews.text: Should have heeded the review that said this was too small for a family of four. Good for 2 people and clean up is easy. Really like the removeable trays. If I had to do this again, I would go up a size for the versatility and get the waffle grid insert.
customer_reviews.author: tallahasseelass

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT EVERYTIME
customer_reviews.text: Mine didnt come cracked or anything...must have got lucky. It works great and seems to have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elis Miles

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Grill for One or Two
customer_reviews.text: I first saw a George Foreman grill in action at a friend's house. I was impressed! This grill does a fast and efficient job of cooking a variety of things. I chose this model because the detachable grill surfaces are dishwasher safe. Clean up is so easy! My only issue is that indoor grilling, whether it's in a skillet or this device, creates cooking odors that I don't care for. After discovering this, I will either put the grill on the stove surface and use the vent to purge smoke and odors, or I'll simply plug it in on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Love this lil thing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks! I had one that seems to have an open in the circuitry, so I had to buy another. Burgers turn out nice and juicy no matter how lean the protein. Removable cooking surface makes cleaning a breeze. Great for two people, but larger models exist for more cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: R M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grill For Us.
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday I made Chicken in Peanut sauce, It's so perfect. My family love it so much. I used this grill for the first time. I am honestly expecting that it will be dry. But I am wrong. The chicken is so juicy and perfect. Thanks to this grill.
customer_reviews.author: JSA

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade from my last Foreman grill
customer_reviews.text: I had my old Foreman grill for about 10 years-and it finally died. This grill cooks in about half the time as the old one did . The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is that the cord is shorter than the old Foreman. Other than that it cooks thoroughly and quickly and is great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Big Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1-2
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it should be called 4-serving. It's more like 2-3 but it's perfect for me as a single person and easy to clean. I wanted something small that had removable grids.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great for burgers if you don't have a BBQ!
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for my boyfriend as a birthday gift. He loves it! He loves making burgers on it and loves the red color. We live in an apartment so we have very strict rules about outdoor BBQs. This is perfect if you can't have a BBQ. The only thing we don't like is that there is no on or off switch. You just plug it in to turn it on, and unplug it to turn it off. But it heats up fast and cooks great. It is also super easy to clean. We love that you can remove the plates to clean them and they are dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Neufeldt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A wee bit smaller than expected. Can cook 3 Burger patties at a time. Washes up beautifully. Easy to put back together. Fantastic find!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Its small and can hold two pieces of meat about the size of your hand. Thats enough for me,but if you have a lot of people to feed, youd need a bigger one. The trays come out for easy cleaning. Cooks my chicken thoroughly and its delicious and no grease!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The size is great, clean-up is easy, but the top grill keeps falling off! And once it is hot, it is really difficult to get it back in its place.Those two little tabs do not hold the top grill in place -- really bad design. Plus, I read another reviewer's comment that the drip catcher doesn't work, and I thought how could that be possible? Well, he was right, it misses a lot of drips and is really messy. Will never buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: lori mavrigian

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for two people. We use it for all our bacon and sausage for breakfast and also makes really good quick burgers. Bought one for my Dad who is 95, perfect for him to make food for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Kate from MN

customer_reviews.title: Not secure or,safe,to use
customer_reviews.text: The top grill keeps coming out the clips,do not hold the grill in place I almost,burnt my hand,when lifting the top to take out what I was,grilling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: The chicken was cooked perfect! I'm not a huge fan of chicken, usually, but it was really good. It's virtually impossible to screw up since there is a green light that turns on when the grill is ready, then turns off and and on again when the food is ready. The grill plates popped off easy and cleaned spotless in the dishwasher, as promised. The cord wraps neatly around the base for convenient storage. I give it a 4.5 stars (it loses .5 of a star because I am a bitch and nothing is perfect)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McMahon

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product for the Money
customer_reviews.text: George dos a great job for simple grilling as it has no adjustable temperature controls.. Great for sausages-bacon grilled sandwiches etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C Brem

customer_reviews.title: Good but not versatile
customer_reviews.text: Good but clearly optimized for burgers. Hot dogs want to squirt out the front lip. Does what it claims making quick work of steaks. It would be nice if the temperature could be adjusted but on this model it is plug-and-play - it is either on or off. The plates are removable and come clean in the dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 grills that crapped out quickly (Cuisinart and t-Fal). This grill was the cheapest and actually has worked without incident for the past 3 months or so. Does a good job doing what it is designed to do
customer_reviews.author: richieggg

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for hamburgers
customer_reviews.text: Delicious hamburgers. Fun to use. The grease got all over the table and the back of the Foreman grill. But the metal plates were easy enough to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bourne

customer_reviews.title: The plates on this grill are so easy to remove, clean, and reinstall.
customer_reviews.text: Although the easy-to-remove grill removal trumps all else regarding this unit, it could be larger to make it more versatile. It really can't cook four of about anything at one time. Availability of a larger unit would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: A.G. Salt

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich Maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this device!!! it is easy to use and most importantly easy to clean!!! I mainly use it to make sandwiches, but there are more ways you can incorporate it in to your cooking!!!
customer_reviews.author: luisa

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, cook in your pan!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to pick up the grease tray without spilling grease all over the place is the real trick with this out-dated cooking device. It does cook a burger in 6-8 minutes as advertised, but it’s a clunky device that could really use a refit!
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, tedious to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I only hate that juices from the top portion will drip onto the areas of the grill that are difficult to clean. Hate cleaning this thing because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleah

customer_reviews.title: Works well, just small.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean, as parts are removable, however, the cooking surface is very small. Listed as a 4 serving grill, but realistically cooks for 2 at a time. Otherwise, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Won’t use anything other than removable plates ever again
customer_reviews.text: I had an original GF grill that was a pain to clean. The removable plates are great! Easy to use and cleanup is a breeze. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

product_meta.title: George Foreman 4-Serving Removable Plate Grill and Panini Press, Red, GRP360R
product_meta.description: Color:RedCook quick and tasty meals for the whole family with the George Foreman GRP360R Grill. The 4-serving area of the grill is ideal for burgers and chicken for the whole family, or for a smaller meal complete with grilled vegetables. The improved George Tough non-stick coating is 2 times more durable than previous models, and removes the need for excess oil and butter. Plus, removable grill plates are dishwasher-safe, making cleanup that much easier. With 35% faster heat-up times, you can go from plugging in the grill to enjoying a tasty meal in just 10 minutes.
feature_bullets: 4 Servings - Tight on kitchen space? The 60-square inch grill is the most popular GEORGE FOREMAN Grill, with space for a tasty main course for four, or a complete meal with veggies and other sides.
Advanced George Tough Coating - We made the George Tough coating even stronger. It’s 3x more durable**, easy to clean, and removes the need for butter and oil.
Removable Plates - Easy cleanup is essential, and that’s what the removable grill plates are all about. Pop them in the dishwasher after grilling and they’ll be ready to go for your next meal.
Ready Indicator Light - Green means go! Indicator lights on the top of the grill let you know when it’s plugged in and when it’s ready to cook.
35% Faster* Heatup - Less time heating, more time eating! The improved heating elements preheat 35% faster* to get you from plug-in to plate in record time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,274 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
